reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed 3 days at Agapi Beach. We had a room in the main building that overlooked the ocean. It had a great view. The room and bathroom were above average. The AC hardly put out any cold air though and it was very warm/humid during our stay.
reviews.title: Average Resort

reviews.text: The pools were nice, albeit people started reserving chairs before 8 am (the same as at the beach) even though they weren't going to actually use them until later. This was problematic for there were many unoccupied "reserved" chairs at the beach and pool thoughout the day and none available for those who didn't think of saving a chair. The beach was clean and had the "Taverna" close by where you could get food, beer and soft drinks. It was also supervised by a lifeguard. There were no waves suitable for surfing/boarding. Buy an inflatable raft at the "dollar" store across the street and mellow out on the small waves. You'll have a blast.
reviews.title: very nice hotel,
